replies.body: Bad, that just gets you more kills (or for me/some people at least). When you get mobbed more, you can get bigger and more xp amounts within a small amount of time.
replies.body_tagged: Bad, that just gets you more kills (or for me/some people at least). When you get mobbed more, you can get bigger and more xp amounts within a small amount of time.

replies.body:
Take it from Emmy. Killfarms every game.  The side walls are what I use to escape. I love it when people killfarm right at the spawn because I know how to get past it and I just end up getting monuments :P 

What you say is true. If you're at Emmy's PvP level and have godlike ms and full dia, nothings stopping you, lol. Just more PvP room for him and more people mobbing.
